Container.Name: valheim-lloesche
Container.Overview: Valheim server setup based on lloesche's image

Config.Name: Server Name
Config.Description: Public name of the game server

Config.Name: Server Public
Config.Description: Whether the game server is public (true | false)

Config.Name: World Name
Config.Description: Name of the Valheim world to load or generate

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Umask to use for backups, config files and directories

Config.Name: Admin Ids
Config.Description: Space separated list of admin SteamIDs

Config.Name: Update Cron
Config.Description: Cron schedule for update checks (disabled if set to an empty string or if the legacy UPDATE_INTERVAL is set)

Config.Name: Restart Cron
Config.Description: Cron schedule for server restarts (disabled if set to an empty string)

Config.Name: Backups
Config.Description: Whether the server should create periodic backups (true | false)

Config.Name: Backup Cron
Config.Description: Cron schedule for world backups (disabled if set to an empty string or if the legacy BACKUPS_INTERVAL is set)

Config.Name: Backups if Idle
Config.Description: Backup even when no players have been connected for a while

Config.Name: Enable Valheim Plus
Config.Description: Whether ValheimPlus mod should be loaded (config in /config/valheimplus, additional plugins in /config/valheimplus/plugins). Can not be used together with BEPINEX.

Config.Name: Enable BepinEx
Config.Description: Whether BepInExPack Valheim mod should be loaded (config in /config/bepinex, plugins in /config/bepinex/plugins). Can not be used together with VALHEIM_PLUS
